Will do. We will meet you in the lobby of MCC at 10 on Thursday. 
Fron 
Sent: Tuesda Au ust 13 2019 4:03 PM

Subject: : Visa urs ay 
If it is not too much of an imposition, we ask that all visitors come to our front lobby for screening before admission. 
Thanks! 
>> > >  8/13/2019 3:58 PM >» 
Yes, thank you. Where should we go? 
From 
Sent• 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday 
It should not be a problem. Does 10 am work for Mr. Berman and the rest of his staff? 
Supervisory Staff Attorney 
CLC New York 
Metropolitan Correctional Center 
150 Park Row 
The list of visitors from our office is below: 
>  8/13/2019 2:05 PM >>> 
EFTA00022631

As discussed, we would like to see the e  d floor pscyh observation and suicide watch area; the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's 
cell, which we understand to still be cordoned off. As discussed, we would appreciate if only MCC legal would escort us, 
and we will not speak to any of the guards present given the ongoing investigations. Please give me a call with any 
questions, and let us know what time and where we should go, and if it would be easier for us to enter via the 3rd floor 
bridge. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00022632
